awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 45 wins & 67 nominations.

fullplot: A female drives a van through the roads and streets of Scotland seducing lonely men.
plot: A mysterious woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. Events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.
title: Under the Skin

tomatoes.consensus: Its message may prove elusive for some, but with absorbing imagery and a mesmerizing performance from Scarlett Johansson, Under the Skin is a haunting viewing experience.

writers: Michel Faber (based on the novel by)
